title: The end is near...
body:
I had to meme this... here you go riot.

(https://imgur.com/CkP19Id)

replies.body:
They're changing Ezreal's W...

In a snap.
They could change his passive too

{{champion:81}} :_Fun isn't something Riot considers while balancing the game but this...does put a smile on my face._

{{sticker:sg-ezreal}}

> [{quoted}](name=PTZekrom69,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=xtq4UodX,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2018-08-07T15:07:38.237+0000)
>
> {{champion:81}} :_Fun isn't something Riot considers while balancing the game but this...does put a smile on my face._
> 
> {{sticker:sg-ezreal}}

WAIT DOES HE ACTUALLY SAY THAT
No but It would be awsome!
"Who needs a snap?!"
{{champion:81}} With the all the infinity stones, I can still miss every. Single. Skillshot.
Only when he's on your team.

ezreals new W
ezreal snaps his fingers and makes half the enemy team disappear at random for 5 seconds.
am I the only one who read the title of this post in {{champion:9}} voice?

> [{quoted}](name=WyvernEgg,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=xtq4UodX,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-08-07T04:03:06.216+0000)
>
> am I the only one who read the title of this post in {{champion:9}} voice?

Yeah... Can't really say it as Thanos. I read it like fiddle but right after that I remember that N&A productions video where he "speaks" with Thanos. I still cannot sleep.

They are going to change ezreals W, but I just want them to finally address how his Q interacts with items so that they can release things without having them immediately be broken by the prodigal buttmuncher
They aren't changing anything but his W.
I THOUGHT THE SAME THING XD
{{champion:142}} "I don't feel so good"
With a snap of his fingers, he can delete any Champion from the game.

His new taunt involve a snap and he'll have a line about turning the enemy to dust for sure.
That's a pretty good edit, btw
2nd link is broken, (rito) fix pls
I'm comming boyz
Ezreal has Fist of Suns confirmed
